name: CREATE TABLE WEATHER
func:
msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS weather_table (time DATE, weathercode INTEGER, temperature_2m_max REAL, temperature_2m_min REAL, uv_index_max REAL, uv_index_clear_sky_max REAL, rain_sum REAL, snowfall_sum REAL, windspeed_10m_max REAL, winddirection_10m_dominant REAL, shortwave_radiation_sum REAL, city_name TEXT, CONSTRAINT unique_city_time UNIQUE (city_name, time), FOREIGN KEY(city_name) REFERENCES cities_table(city_name))";
return msg;

name: DROP TABLE WEATHER
func:
msg.topic = "drop table if exists weather_table";
return msg;
